short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remember the reason to follow an account on social platforms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never forget why you followed an account on social platforms. Reason to Follow is a browser extension designed to help you remember the original interesting reason behind your decision to follow an account. 

This extension currently supports Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn and GitHub.

Sync with Chrome:
If you're signed in to the Chrome browser, Reason to Follow will sync your data with your Chrome account. This ensures that your reasons for following accounts are securely saved and easily accessible across devices.

Eliminate frustration:
Say goodbye to the frustration of going back to an account you've been following, only to find that the account description has changed. With Reason to Follow, you can always recall the original motivation that led you to follow those accounts.
